attributes.action: We, the undersigned, voted Leave on 23rd June but would now vote Remain
attributes.additional_details: Please do not sign this petition if you voted Remain. This is for people who voted Leave on 23rd June but, if given a second chance, they would vote Remain because of the questionable information that led to their decision.
attributes.background: Since June 23rd 2016, people have emerged who regret their vote to leave the EU and would vote to remain if asked again. Many feel that they were persuaded to vote this way in the light of things that were not true. The purpose of this petition is to see how many people feel this way.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
